programme.desc: Το γερμανικό πρωτάθλημα αυτοκίνητων τουρισμού DTM φέρνει στους φίλους του μηχανοκίνητου αθλητισμού δράση, ταχύτητα και δεξιοτεχνία από κορυφαίους διεθνείς οδηγούς.

programme.title: Εκπομπή Grand Prix 2024
programme.desc: Η εκπομπή για όλες τις εξελίξεις στα πρωταθλήματα μηχανοκίνητου αθλητισμού που φιλοξενεί η COSMΟΤΕ TV (MotoGP, WRC, ERC, FIA WORLD RALLYCROSS, DTM).

programme.title: Motorsports: MotoGP 2024
programme.desc: Qatar Airways Australian Motorcycle Grand Prix - Tissot Sprint. Το Παγκόσμιο Πρωτάθλημα FIM MotoGP 2024 περιλαμβάνει 11 ομάδες από 5 κατασκευαστές. Συνολικά 22 αναβάτες διεκδικούν τον τίτλο μέσα από 22 Γκραν Πρι, τα οποία διεξάγονται από 10 Μαρτίου έως 17 Νοεμβρίου Περιγραφή: Δημήτρης Διατσίδης.

programme.title: Motorsports: MotoGP 2024
programme.desc: Qatar Airways Australian Motorcycle Grand Prix - Αγώνας. Το Παγκόσμιο Πρωτάθλημα FIM MotoGP 2024 περιλαμβάνει 11 ομάδες από 5 κατασκευαστές. Συνολικά 22 αναβάτες διεκδικούν τον τίτλο μέσα από 22 Γκραν Πρι, τα οποία διεξάγονται από 10 Μαρτίου έως 17 Νοεμβρίου. Περιγραφή: Δημήτρης Διατσίδης.

programme.title: WRC 2024
programme.desc: Ιαπωνία, SS21 Lake Mikawako 2 Wolf Power Stage. Παρακολουθήστε το Παγκόσμιο Πρωτάθλημα ράλι του 2024. Περιγραφή: Γιάννης Μάριος Παπαδόπουλος.

programme.title: WRC 2024
programme.desc: Παρακολουθήστε το Παγκόσμιο Πρωτάθλημα ράλι του 2024.

programme.title: ERC 2024
programme.desc: Με χρονιά εκκίνησης το 1953, το Ευρωπαϊκό Πρωτάθλημα Ράλι της FIA γίνεται 72 ετών το 2024 με ένα πρόγραμμα γύρων που διεξάγεται σε άσφαλτο και χαλίκι. Πρόκειται για το απόλυτο πεδίο προπόνησης για τα νέα ταλέντα που στοχεύουν στην κορυφή του αθλήματος.

programme.title: ATP Specials
programme.desc: Ντελ Πότρο - Ναδάλ (Προημιτελικός Miami Open 2009). Μια σειρά αφιερωμάτων σε στιγμές, αγώνες, τενίστες και τενίστριες που έγραψαν ιστορία στα τουρνουά ATP.

programme.title: ATP Specials
programme.desc: Federer vs Nadal (2006 Monte Carlo Masters Final). Μια σειρά αφιερωμάτων σε στιγμές, αγώνες, τενίστες και τενίστριες που έγραψαν ιστορία στα τουρνουά ATP.

programme.title: Sports Classics: 2024 Outdoor Specials
programme.desc: Το Outdoor Specials σας φέρνει τα πιο συναρπαστικά γεγονότα στον κόσμο των extreme sports. Από το windsurfing μέχρι την ορειβασία και από την οδήγηση αγώνων μέχρι τις καταδύσεις σπηλαίων, αυτή είναι μια σειρά που θα σας δώσει μια γενναιόδωρη δόση αδρεναλίνης.

programme.title: Πολεμικές Τέχνες: UFC Fight Night 2024
programme.desc: Νέα Υόρκη, ΗΠΑ. Το καράτε ανταγωνίζεται το κουνγκ φου και το μποξ το ζίου ζίτσου. Το κικ μποξ έρχεται αντιμέτωπο με το τζούντο και η πάλη με το μάι τάι. Η 'μάχη' μεταξύ των πολεμικών τεχνών και η ανάδειξη του 'απόλυτου πρωταθλητή' μόνο στα κανάλια COSMOTE SPORT. Περιγραφή: Χρήστος Γάτσης.

programme.title: Hanukkah on the Rocks

programme.title: Deck the Walls
programme.desc: Interior designer, Rose DeMonte, uses her skills back in her hometown to renovate a Christmas Charity Home for her brother Sal and his contractor Brysen's home flipping company.

programme.title: Holiday Hotline
programme.desc: After leaving London, Abby works for a cooking hotline and connects with an anonymous caller, a single father who Abby is unknowingly smitten with in real life.

programme.title: Ghosts of Christmas Always
programme.desc: Katherine, a Ghost of Christmas Present, must help one soul rediscover his Christmas spirit, but this year has something unusual in store.

programme.title: The Holiday Sitter
programme.desc: Sam is a workaholic bachelor who's babysitting his niece and nephew during the holidays. Completely out of his element, he recruits help from a handsome neighbor and soon finds himself in an unexpected romance.

programme.title: Christmas in Rome
programme.desc: Angela, an American tour guide in Rome, agrees to teach a culture-shocked businessman named Oliver about the heart of Rome at Christmas.

programme.title: Round and Round
programme.desc: Rachel's stuck in a time loop, reliving the night of her parents' Hanukkah party. Can Zach, the nice boy grandma's trying to set her up with, help her make it to tomorrow?

programme.title: The Santa Class
programme.desc: Kate North, the owner of a struggling Santa School, and her instructor, Dan, must help an amnesia-stricken Santa Claus regain his memories to save Christmas and hopefully her school as well.

programme.title: Next Stop, Christmas
programme.desc: Angie wonders what life would be like if she had married an ex who became famous. When she finds herself magically transported into the past, Angie has the chance to relive that Christmas and learn what (and who) is truly important to her.

programme.title: Christmas Island
programme.desc: When a snowstorm diverts Kate's first private flight to Christmas Island, she must team up with an air traffic controller to secure her dream job as the family's pilot.

programme.title: Write Before Christmas
programme.desc: Jessica sends Christmas cards to five people who have greatly impacted her life.

programme.title: A Novel Noel
programme.desc: A NYC book editor takes on a temporary gig running a Maine bookstore. Battling with the owners' son, she rediscovers her passion for nurturing creativity.

programme.title: A Fabled Holiday
programme.desc: Talia and her childhood best friend unexpectedly reunite in a curiously familiar-looking town that's full of Christmas spirit.

programme.title: A Fabled Holiday
programme.desc: Talia and her childhood best friend unexpectedly reunite in a curiously familiar-looking town that's full of Christmas spirit.

programme.title: A Heidelberg Holiday
programme.desc: Heidi Heidelberg receives a dream opportunity to sell her beautiful, handmade glass ornaments at the prestigious Heidelberg Christmas Market in Germany. While there, she meets Lukas, a local artisan who helps her reconnect with her lost heritage.

programme.title: Christmas in Evergreen: Letters to Santa
programme.desc: Lisa's trip home to Evergreen for the holidays finds her shepherding an effort to save the town's beloved general store, fulfilling the wishes of a Christmas past and finding a romance full of Christmas magic.

programme.title: Check Inn to Christmas
programme.desc: Julia Crawley and Ryan Mason must unite their families during Crestridge's Centennial Christmas celebration to save their family inns from a chain resort.

programme.title: A Kiss Before Christmas
programme.desc: Ethan, always the nice guy, wakes up to a new reality at Christmastime. He's initially enthralled with his new life but soon realizes it's not what he thought it would be.

programme.title: Leah's Perfect Gift
programme.desc: A Jewish Leah accompanies her boyfriend to Connecticut to experience a traditional Christmas with his family.

programme.title: A Royal Christmas
programme.desc: The queen (Jane Seymour) of Cordinia schemes to break up her royal son's (Stephen Hagan) romance with a seamstress (Lacey Chabert) from Philadelphia.

programme.title: Checkin' It Twice
programme.desc: Sparks fly between a hockey player and a real estate agent after he moves into a cottage in her family's backyard.

programme.title: Rescuing Christmas
programme.desc: Erin unwittingly wishes away Christmas, and Sam steps in to help bring it back.

programme.title: Happy Howlidays
programme.desc: Mia, a meticulous webpage editor for the Seattle Tourism Board, finds herself unexpectedly navigating the holidays alone. As the only one working, she's drawn into an unusual encounter when she encounters a stray dog.

programme.title: The Sweetest Christmas
programme.desc: A struggling pastry chef is thrilled to learn that she has made it to the finals of the American Gingerbread Competition, but distractions in her love life threaten to derail her dreams of taking home the grand prize.

programme.title: Trading Up Christmas
programme.desc: Michelle tries to get her sister a new place to live and all she has is a Christmas stocking to trade with.

programme.title: Time for Them to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: A woman with amnesia catches a ride with her handsome nurse to investigate the only clue to her identity: a newspaper clipping for a Christmas festival with a cryptic invitation.

programme.title: A Glenbrooke Christmas
programme.desc: As Christmas nears, heiress Jessica Morgan seizes what seems like her last chance to experience a relaxed Christmas and heads off to the small town of Glenbrooke, where she meets a handsome fireman.

programme.title: Christmas Under the Stars
programme.desc: Nick loses his high finance job right before Christmas. Lost, he takes a gig at a tree lot, where he meets Julie and her son, Matt.

programme.title: My Sweet Austrian Holiday
programme.desc: Charlotte inherits a chocolate shop from her grandparents but soon finds herself in a battle with a large developer who wants to buy the building to turn it into an exclusive shopping boutique.

programme.title: Deliver by Christmas
programme.desc: Bakery owner Molly meets Josh, a newcomer in town, but is also enchanted by a mysterious client whom she's never met in person. A special wish to be delivered by Christmas could help determine who will win Molly's heart.

programme.title: Home for Christmas Day
programme.desc: A young woman begins a long-distance relationship with an active-duty soldier. Her mother tries to steer her away from the relationship to save her feelings.

programme.title: Merry & Bright
programme.desc: Merry and Bright Candy Cane Company owner Cate meets a man during the busy Christmas season and assumes he is the suitor her mother is trying to set her up with.

programme.title: Christmas in My Heart
programme.desc: Violinist Beth returns home after the recent death of her mother and tutors the daughter of a reclusive country music star to prepare her for the upcoming holiday concert.

programme.title: Family for Christmas
programme.desc: After an offhand wish to a man playing Santa Claus, a woman wakes up to find herself married to her college sweetheart.

programme.title: Christmas in Angel Falls
programme.desc: Guardian angel Gabby is sent to the town of Angel Falls to restore its Christmas spirit. As she helps the townspeople to revive their traditions, Gabby meets a volunteer fire chief who teaches her the truth about the love she admires from afar.

programme.title: Christmas at Grand Valley
programme.desc: Kelly returns to Grand Valley for Christmas. When Leo, a single dad, arrives in town with his kids to review a hotel, the two cross paths. As Kelly re-experiences traditions with Leo, she begins to find her way back to her passion for art.

programme.title: Karen Kingsbury's Maggie's Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: Maggie tries to maintain the balance of being a mother and having a career. When her son Jordan needs help at school, he meets Casey, a tutor, and the two quickly bond. As Casey becomes a father figure, Jordan wishes his mom could find love again.

programme.title: Time for Him to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Four days before Christmas, Elizabeth Athens receives a voicemail from a number she doesn't recognize. On the message, a man she doesn't know makes one final plea for the love of his life to give him a second chance.

programme.title: Five Gold Rings
programme.desc: An artist returns home for the holidays and gets tasked with a Christmas quest left by her grandmother. She and the local PI must return lost items to their owners before Christmas.

programme.title: Long Lost Christmas
programme.desc: Hayley is an interior designer who plans to surprise her recently widowed mother with the perfect holiday present -- the extended family she knows her mom yearns for.

programme.title: Five More Minutes: Moments Like These
programme.desc: Returning to her old home for the holidays, a young widow's Christmas wish for her son gets answered in unexpected ways.

programme.title: Christmas Wonderland
programme.desc: Heidi returns home to watch her niece and nephew and comes face to face with her high school love. Heidi offers to help him with a dance, and the more time she spends decorating, the more she finds herself inspired to start painting again.

programme.title: Journey Back to Christmas
programme.desc: A nurse (Candace Cameron Bure) from World War II is transported in time to 2016 and meets a man who helps her discover the bonds of family and that the true meaning of Christmas is timeless.

programme.title: Jingle Bell Bride
programme.desc: A wedding planner finds romance with a handsome local after traveling to a remote town in Alaska to find a rare flower for a celebrity client.

programme.title: My Christmas Guide
programme.desc: After losing his eyesight, a college professor adopts a seeing-eye dog from a guide dog trainer. As they all spend time together, his confidence returns and his heart begins to open.

programme.title: Love You Like Christmas
programme.desc: A high-powered executive reconsiders her priorities when car trouble leads her to Christmas Valley, a town in love with Christmas.

programme.title: Mystery on Mistletoe Lane
programme.desc: New to town, Heidi Wicks and her kids discover a Christmas mystery in their historic home. Local handyman and historian David helps along the way, finding his own surprising connection.

programme.title: Christmas in Evergreen: Tidings of Joy
programme.desc: A skeptical writer shows up in Evergreen to get the scoop on the town's famed passion for Christmas during a search for a long-lost time capsule.

programme.title: We Need a Little Christmas
programme.desc: Facing her first Christmas as a single mother, Julie develops an unexpected friendship with an older neighbor.

programme.title: To All a Good Night
programme.desc: A small-town photographer saves the life of a mysterious man who may just be here to buy her family's parkland.

programme.title: Christmas on My Mind
programme.desc: Lucy Lovett wakes up holding a wedding dress and assumes she is about to marry the love her life, Zach Callahan.

programme.desc: Što je u košarci NBA, to je u odbojci italijanska liga. Svaki meč je spektakl, a mnogi vrednuju ovu titulu više od nekog evropskog trofeja.

programme.title: Fudbal: Zalivski kup: Kuwait - Qatar
programme.desc: Svake druge godine, fudbalske reprezentacije Bahreina, Iraka, Kuvajta, Omana, Katara, Saudijske Arabije, Ujedinjenih Arapskih Emirata i Jemena okupljaju se u borbi za pobedu na prestižnom Zalivskom...

programme.title: Rivalitet legendi
programme.desc: Vukli su jedni druge napred, uvek je neki rivalitet izdizao sport na lestvicu više. Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova.

programme.title: Rukomet - Nemačka liga: Gummersbach - Fuchse
programme.desc: Rukometna Bundesliga je najviši rang takmičenja u Nemačkoj. Kvalitetom igre smatra se jednim od najkvalitetnijih rukometnih liga na svetu.

programme.title: Fast Zone
programme.desc: U ovoj emisiji, videćemo šta se dešava na serijama koje ne prenosi Sport Klub. I ovde ima kvalitetnih i ambicioznih vozača koji žele da se probiju u sam vrh.

programme.title: Košarka - Španska liga: Coruna - Bilbao
programme.desc: Španska košarkaška ACB liga osnovana je 1957. godine kao "Liga National". U ligi sudeluje 18 ekipa prema dvokružnom sistemu takmičenja. (LIVE).

programme.title: Pregled turske lige
programme.desc: Bešiktaš može da se hvali šampionskom titulom, ali Trabzon, Galatasaraj i Fenerbahče su se ozbiljno pojačali i svi misle da mogu do trofeja. Čini se da će biti napeto do poslednjeg kola.

programme.title: Pregled holandske lige
programme.desc: Očekuje se trka Ajaksa i PSV-a za titulu. Može li Fejenord da im se priključi ili će AZ Alkmar napasti iz senke?

programme.title: Omaž zvezdama
programme.desc: Bokseri, fudbaleri, košarkaši... Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova. Na istom mestu, u isto vreme, kako ih uporediti i kako napraviti večne liste.

programme.title: Košarka - Australijska liga: Adelaide - Perth
programme.desc: Nema boljeg načina da se počne dan nego uz australijsku košarku. Uzeli su medalju na Olimpijskim igrama, hale su pune i napreduju iz godine u godinu.

programme.title: Fudbal: Zalivski kup: Bahrain - Yemen
programme.desc: Svake druge godine, fudbalske reprezentacije Bahreina, Iraka, Kuvajta, Omana, Katara, Saudijske Arabije, Ujedinjenih Arapskih Emirata i Jemena okupljaju se u borbi za pobedu na prestižnom Zalivskom...
